author: Bill Frist, M.D.
title: 3 Ways Policymakers Could Help Our Nation’s Doctors And Nurses
description: As a former heart-transplant surgeon and former U.S. Senator, I understand the frustrations many on the front lines of this pandemic are experiencing. Here are three things those doctors and nurses—dedicated but tired, anxious and feeling betrayed by governme…
